This includes identification of requirements and interfaces for enabling systems. 6) Obtain or acquire access to the enabling systems or services to be used to support validation. NOTE The infrastructure management process or acquisition process can be invoked to obtain access to enabling systems, such as through rental, procurement, development, reuse, or subcontracting.
